description:
Brace yourself, the budget Eagle has landed. An evolution of the proven 1x specific X-HORIZON line, this derailleur suits enduro and trail riders ready for the 12-speed world. You don't have to compromise gear range, weight or reliability. The 14t lower pulley is compatible with 10-50t and new 10-52t cassettes and offers a smooth pedalling feel. The roller bearing clutch features a smoothed torque curve for consistent operation, and the cage lock is moved back to protect it from trail debris.

  • Compatible only with SRAM Eagle 1x12 drivetrains
  • Roller bearing clutch minimizes chain-slap and derailleur bounce
  • Cage lock keeps derailleur cage in place for easy wheel removal and maintenance
  • Offset X-SYNC pulleys yield solid chain engagements, durability and reduced chain gap
  • X-ACTUATION keeps shifting sharp and consistent
  • X-HORIZON design eliminates ghost shifting
  • Pulleys are efficient, crisp and quiet
  • Updated aluminum cage improves chain retention and shifting
name: SRAM GX Eagle B2 10-52t Derailleur
